tool.name: InternalCalibration
tool.command:
InternalCalibration
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_ppm_match_tolerance: -ppm_match_tolerance $param_ppm_match_tolerance #end if
#if $rep_param_ms_level: -ms_level #for token in $rep_param_ms_level: #if " " in str(token): "$token.param_ms_level" #else $token.param_ms_level #end if #end for #end if #if $param_RT_chunking: -RT_chunking $param_RT_chunking #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $param_cal_id_in: -cal:id_in $param_cal_id_in #end if #if $param_cal_lock_in: -cal:lock_in $param_cal_lock_in #end if #if $param_cal_lock_out: -cal:lock_out $param_cal_lock_out #end if #if $param_cal_lock_fail_out: -cal:lock_fail_out $param_cal_lock_fail_out #end if #if $param_cal_lock_require_mono: -cal:lock_require_mono #end if #if $param_cal_lock_require_iso: -cal:lock_require_iso #end if #if $param_cal_model_type: -cal:model_type $param_cal_model_type #end if #if $param_RANSAC_enabled: -RANSAC:enabled #end if #if $param_RANSAC_threshold: -RANSAC:threshold $param_RANSAC_threshold #end if #if $param_RANSAC_pc_inliers: -RANSAC:pc_inliers $param_RANSAC_pc_inliers #end if #if $param_RANSAC_iter: -RANSAC:iter $param_RANSAC_iter #end if #if $param_goodness_median: -goodness:median $param_goodness_median #end if #if $param_goodness_MAD: -goodness:MAD $param_goodness_MAD #end if #if $param_quality_control_models: -quality_control:models $param_quality_control_models #end if #if $param_quality_control_models_plot: -quality_control:models_plot $param_quality_control_models_plot #end if #if $param_quality_control_residuals: -quality_control:residuals $param_quality_control_residuals #end if #if $param_quality_control_residuals_plot: -quality_control:residuals_plot $param_quality_control_residuals_plot #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: Input peak file

param.name: param_ppm_match_tolerance
param.label: Finding calibrants in raw data uses this tolerance (for lock masses and ID's)

param.name: param_ms_level
param.label: Target MS levels to apply the transformation onto

param.name: param_RT_chunking
param.label: RT window (one-sided, i.e
param.help: (-RT_chunking) left->center, or center->right) around an MS scan in which calibrants are collected to build a model. Set to -1 to use ALL calibrants for all scans, i.e. a global model

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_cal_id_in
param.label: Identifications or features whose peptide ID's serve as calibration masses

param.name: param_cal_lock_in
param.label: Input file containing reference m/z values (text file with each line as: m/z ms-level charge) which occur in all scans

param.name: param_cal_lock_require_mono
param.label: Require all lock masses to be monoisotopic, i.e
param.help: (-lock_require_mono) not the iso1, iso2 etc ('charge' column is used to determine the spacing). Peaks which are not mono-isotopic are not used

param.name: param_cal_lock_require_iso
param.label: Require all lock masses to have at least the +1 isotope
param.help: (-lock_require_iso) Peaks without isotope pattern are not used

param.name: param_cal_model_type
param.label: Type of function to be fitted to the calibration points

param.name: param_RANSAC_enabled
param.label: Apply RANSAC to calibration points to remove outliers before fitting a model

param.name: param_RANSAC_threshold
param.label: Threshold for accepting inliers (instrument precision (not accuracy!) as ppm^2 distance)

param.name: param_RANSAC_pc_inliers
param.label: Minimum percentage (of available data) of inliers (<threshold away from model) to accept the model

param.name: param_RANSAC_iter
param.label: Maximal # iterations

param.name: param_goodness_median
param.label: The median ppm error of calibrated masses must be smaller than this threshold

param.name: param_goodness_MAD
param.label: The median absolute deviation of the ppm error of calibrated masses must be smaller than this threshold

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_debug
param.label: Sets the debug level

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_force
param.label: Overwrite tool specific checks

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Applies an internal mass recalibration.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_InternalCalibration.html
